returnusererroraction.errortext: You cannot send this purchase order for approval because you currently have no assigned supervisor. Please take steps to have a supervisor added to your employee record, and try again.

initcondition.formula: ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Total" > 25000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Total" > 10000.00 )
( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Total" <= 25000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Total" <= 10000.00 )
( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Total" > 50000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Total" > 25000.00 )
( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Total" <= 50000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Total" <= 25000.00 )
